english.segment1: Time is tight and money's short. River's up and the weather man. He's calling for another storm. Pressure's on, margin's thin. Gotta figure out of thicks. For this all for fix I'm in
english.segment2: Oh mama, what am I gonna do?. She said, "Child, there's only one thing you can do"
english.segment3: Don't worry 'bout nothing. Let it go, see what tomorrow brings. Don't worry 'bout nothing. Pray 'bout everything
english.segment4: Love is blind, fate don't care. Lose your grip and your balloons. Go sailing off into the air
english.segment5: Oh mama, what am I gonna do?. She said, "Child, there's only one thing you can do"
english.segment6: Don't worry 'bout nothing. Just let it go, see what tomorrow brings. Don't worry 'bout nothing. Pray 'bout everything. Hey, pray about everything
english.segment7: Oh, take a walk, take a break. Oh, give it all a rest. Take a [Incomprehensible] to the fishing hole. And catch a couple of fish. Just like flap, toss 'em back. Make a little wish
english.segment8: Pray about everything. Pray about, worry 'bout nothing. Just let it go, see what tomorrow brings. Don't worry 'bout it, stress about it, pray about it
english.segment9: No, don't worry 'bout nothing. Hey, let it go, see what tomorrow brings. Don't worry 'bout nothing. Pray about everything. Hey, pray about everything
